summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing the sale of Lot B, City of Seattle Short Plat Number 81-230-0270, recorded under Recording Number 8309120907, and a portion of Government Lot 3, Section 2, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, Willamette Meridian, reserving a utilities corridor easement, granting a non-exclusive gas pipeline easement, and granting an easement for access.
